segments.text: I'm so hungry ! I haven't late eaten all day !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take your mind off it . Look , Crys.This magazine is on China's top ten beauties !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're all so thin ! Her cheekbones are great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She doesn't have an ounce of fat on her face .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The mag says she's 165 centimeters tall and 38 kilos . If only we could be that thin then ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not even drinking milk for one month would get us like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at this girl's gray dress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I went to try it on yesterday , but it only came in extra small .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Last time I wore extra small was when I was in fifth grade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( Weigh herself ) Hey , I lost a kilo in a week with my all-fruit diet . If I keep going , I can wear that dress next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So why are you dieting this time anyway ? Another guy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dieting . It's the price we pay to make men notice us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The girls in this magazine are so slender .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're also way younger than us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True.You know , I First started dieting when I was ten .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . Too much work . I hate to sweat . It's so gross .
segments.speaker: S2
